ProductInfo.Features:
Nikon's most compact FX-format HD-SLR
Newly developed 24.3 MP FX-format CMOS sensor
Share D600 images with the optional WU-1b Wireless Mobile Adapter (sold seperately)
Cinema-quality Full HD (1080p)
Compatible with all NIKKOR lenses, FX and DX formats
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D600 24.3 MP CMOS Full Frame FX-Format Digital SLR Camera with 24-85mm f/3.5-4.5G ED VR AF-S Nikkor Lens + Nikon AF Zoom Nikkor 70-300mm f/4-5.6G Lens + Camera Bag + Professional Tripod + Two (x2) LEXSpeed 8GB SDHC Class 10 Memory Cards + Lens Pen Cleaning System + Giotto's Air Blower + Lens Pen Cleaning System + Memory Card Reader + Camera Cleaning Kit + Multi-Coated 2pc Filter Kit
